author: vors
body:
- [x] Resolves issue #1555 and #1489
- [x] Code is [rebased](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/docs/git/powershell-repository-101.md#sync-your-local-repo) on `origin/master`.
- [ ] Add tests that fail without your changes.
- [ ] Update all relevant [documentation](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/tree/master/docs).

comments.author: vors
comments.body:
Build failure seems related to corrupted nuget cache.
I wiped all caches on travis, cc @andschwa

title: Bring the latest changes from windows source tree
